data.title: The Drowsy Chaperone, Repertory Company Theatre (RCT) at Repertory Company Theatre, Richardson TX, Theatre
data.meta_description: Welcome to ArtsinRichardson.com! This website allows visitors to learn about the many arts events going on in Richardson in a single place. We expect Richardson residents will find ArtsinRichardson.com to be a valuable tool in planning local outings and supporting our many arts groups. Visitors will find out about the vibrant arts community in Richardson.
data.text:
The Drowsy Chaperone, August 18-27

The Drowsy Chaperone August 18-27

The Drowsy Chaperone

August 18-27

Fridays & Saturdays 7:30, Sundays 2:00

Tickets: $32 adults, $18 youth PG13

A musical within a comedy

Music and Lyrics by Lisa Lambert & Greg Morrison

Book by Bob Martin & Don McKellar

The Drowsy Chaperone, a madcap, screwball musical within a comedy, a lovable send up to the Jazz Age musical. A multiple Tony Award winner, The Drowsy Chaperone pays tribute to the Jazz-Age shows of the 1920s and their power to transport us into a dazzling fantasy and to lift our ... view more Â»

The Drowsy Chaperone

August 18-27

Fridays & Saturdays 7:30, Sundays 2:00

Tickets: $32 adults, $18 youth PG13

A musical within a comedy

Music and Lyrics by Lisa Lambert & Greg Morrison

Book by Bob Martin & Don McKellar

The Drowsy Chaperone, a madcap, screwball musical within a comedy, a lovable send up to the Jazz Age musical. A multiple Tony Award winner, The Drowsy Chaperone pays tribute to the Jazz-Age shows of the 1920s and their power to transport us into a dazzling fantasy and to lift our spirits.

ADMISSION INFO

free convenient parking

ADA seating or groups, call box office.

Phone: (972) 690-5029

Email: rcttheatre@aol.com

Website: https://www.rcttheatre.com

LOCATION

Repertory Company Theatre

770 N COIT RD STE 2405, Richardson, TX 75080

Accessibility Information: Currently, no accessibility information is available for this event.

Connect with this Organization: DONATE

PARKING INFO

Free convenient parking.

Coit Road just north of 635 and south of 190.

CONNECT WITH Repertory Company Theatre (RCT)

MEMBER REVIEWS

There are currently no reviews/comments for this event. Be the first to add a review/comment , and let folks know what you think!

This website allows visitors to learn about the many arts events going on in Richardson in a single place. We expect Richardson residents will find ArtsinRichardson.com to be a valuable tool in planning local outings and supporting our many arts groups. Visitors will find out about the vibrant arts community in Richardson.
